verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
WOUNDED FOR OUR TRANSGRESSIONS,
Bruised for our iniquities; all of our sins on Him
were laid, by His stripes we are healed. He was
despised and rejected, Man of Sorrows was He.
How can I help but love Him? He gave His all for
me. How can I help but love Him? He bore it all
for me
